QueryViewSpec.Name: TESTING ONLY Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: A view defined for querying on testing only records
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select cp_ext.ID, (select LOOKUPID from CONSTITUENT WHERE ID = cp_ext.ID) as LOOKUPID, proj_const.NAME from dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTEXTENSION cp_ext left join dbo.CONSTITUENT as proj_const on proj_const.ID = cp_ext.ID
